text:
(K
May 29, 1962
Mr. John C. Schwarzwalder
General Manager, KTCA-TV
Twin City Area Educational Television Corp.
1640 Como Avenue
St. Paul 13, Minnesota
Dear John:
I have your note expressing approval of the
Alabama ETV Commission's Petition for Rule Amend¬
ment concerning usage of frequencies above 890 me.
This proposal is now being studied by our engineer¬
ing consultants, Jansky & Bailey, and we have asked
them to examine it and give us their recommendation
consistent with previous petitions on allocations. If
they raise no objection, we will come in with a strong
supporting statement to the Alabama request.
Cordially,
William G. Harley
WGH :pw
